description: Schema for the response by the get-emanifest-correction-details service

active.description: Indicates if the Manifest version is active or outdated for the industry.

ppcActive.description: Indicates if the Manifest version is active or outdated for the PPC.

epaSiteId.description: Contains the site id associated with the user which signed the correction version.

createdDate.description: Contains the creation date of the Manifest version.

updatedDate.description: Contains the update date of the Manifest version.

updatedBy.description: Contains the user id of the Manifest version updater

ElectronicSignature.description: Contains Generator or TSDF or Transporter Signer Info, Date of Signature and Signed document metadata. Shall not be provided for Save and Update services. Will be returned by Get Manifest Service if the participant (Generator, Transporter, TSDF) Electronicaly signed the manifest

Document.description: Attachments metadata formDocument is the PDF generated by EPA.  printedDocument is the file uploaded to EPA

size.description: Size of file, optional for upload

SiteType.description: Specifies How a site interacts with this manifest
